choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
### Assistant:

Here is your weekly meal plan, based on the ingredients you provided. Each day has three meals and two snacks included in each of them. The total number of calories consumed per week will be approximately 2200 kcal/day (which can vary depending on individual needs). Please note that this plan does not take into account any additional physical activity or dietary requirements, so please consult a professional before making significant changes to your diet and exercise routine:
Day 1: 
- Breakfast - Oatmeal with almond milk, banana slices, walnuts, cinnamon powder (100 kcal)
- Snack - Apple slices with almond butter (50 kcal)
- Lunch - Quinoa salad with mixed vegetables, chickpeas, lemon juice and olive oil dressing (200 kcal) 
- Snack - Carrot sticks with hummus (60 kcal)
Day 2: 
- Breakfast - Scrambled eggs with spinach leaves, sliced tomatoes, whole wheat toast (150 kcal)
- Snack - Greek yogurt with mixed berries (50 kcal)
- Lunch - Grilled chicken breast salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber slices and balsamic vinaigrette dressing (200 kcal) 
- Snack - Roasted chickpeas with mixed vegetables (60 kcal)
Day 3: 
- Breakfast - Smoothie bowl with banana, spinach leaves, almond milk, chia seeds, topped with sliced strawberries (150 kcal)
-<|im_end|>
